channel.title: Been working on a shell script for two days
channel.description:
So I will finally break down and ask for help. I need to convert a .bat file to .sh and I cant do it. Here is the bat [code]@echo off title runserver "C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/jre7/bin/java.exe" -Xmx815m -cp bin;lib/*; com.rs.Launcher true true false pause[/code]
Here is the sh I tryed [code]#!/bin/bash "java" -Xmx815m -cp bin;lib/*; com.rs.Launcher true true false pause[/code]
I have searched forever to solve this and I have failed at google any help would be greatly appreciated. Also you would be the best person ever if you could help with this [code]@echo off echo Compiling "C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.7.0_01/bin/javac.exe" -d bin -cp data/libs/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/*.java "C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.7.0_01/bin/javac.exe" -d bin -cp data/libs/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/game/npc/familiar/*.java echo Complete pause[/code] to a sh as well.

item.title: Been working on a shell script for two days
item.dc:creator: @mort21 mort21
item.description:
@mort21 wrote:

I got it finally!!!

Here is my solution
run.sh

#!/usr/bin/bash java -cp .:./classes: Server

and compile.sh

#!/usr/bin/bash mkdir classes javac -d ./classes ./src/*.java

Now I should have this beast up n running soon.

Read full topic
item.source: Been working on a shell script for two days

item.title: Been working on a shell script for two days
item.dc:creator: @mort21 mort21
item.description:
@mort21 wrote:

So I will finally break down and ask for help.
I need to convert a .bat file to .sh and I cant do it.
Here is the bat

@echo off title runserver "C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/jre7/bin/java.exe" -Xmx815m -cp bin;lib/*; com.rs.Launcher true true false pause

Here is the sh I tryed

#!/bin/bash "java" -Xmx815m -cp bin;lib/*; com.rs.Launcher true true false pause

I have searched forever to solve this and I have failed at google
any help would be greatly appreciated.
Also you would be the best person ever if you could help with this

@echo off echo Compiling "C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.7.0_01/bin/javac.exe" -d bin -cp data/libs/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/*.java "C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.7.0_01/bin/javac.exe" -d bin -cp data/libs/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/game/npc/familiar/*.java echo Complete pause
to a sh as well.
